casebody.data:
Pierre Louis MERONE and Clementine Merone, Appellants,
v.
The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON f/k/a the Bank of New York, as Trustee FOR the CERTIFICATE HOLDERS CWALT, INC., ALTERNATIVE LOAN TRUST 2006-OA3 MORTGAGE PASS THROUGH CERTIFICATES, SERIES 2006-OA3, Appellee. Case No. 2D16-3736 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed September 15, 2017

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
